column4: I am reviewing the other XChat. What I find confusing is where you say 'paste in this text:http://pastebin.com/QiTN1T1M'. Do you mean to put the line starting with http in the file I am editing?
you want those 3 lines in the file, I thought the amount of gap I left I imagined would make that clear....
not clear, does the pastebin line go in the conf file?
i'll repastebin dude, the bits in between the MASSIVE gaps are to go in the files.
http://pastebin.ubuntu.com/534731/
what massive gaps
read the paste
I will do so
very clear - I am doing it, thanks, I will let you know!
how do I restart X?
thanks
np man
after reboot - I will try the you tube on Go
put the battery back in, none of the options edit the power stuffs
sorry, on the small screen synch is ok, but fullscreen is not - and very choppy. Is there something we could test?
what video chip are you using?
where do I find that?
run: lspci | grep -i vga
the command gives "01:00.0 VGA compatible controller: nVidia Corporation G84M [Quadro FX 570M] (rev a1)"
I must restart
I am back, but found a driver not active, but restart again
appears that the 'Additional Drivers' have conflicting drivers . Two of them are fighting.
then remove both drivers and reboot, then install one
